src:
Tanggapan Ovo soal Aplikasi Ngadat
05 Nov 2019, 16:22 by Tim - detikInet


Aplikasi Ovo. Foto: Rachmatunnisa/detikINET

Jakarta - Sebagian pengguna layanan pembayaran Ovo melaporkan terjadi masalah dan menumpahkan komplain di Twitter. Pihak Ovo pun memberikan tanggapannya.Sejak siang tadi, gangguan dialami oleh sebagian pemakai di mana mereka tidak bisa melakukan pembayaran dengan Ovo. Bahkan beberapa malah sign out dan tidak bisa login."@ovo_id Kak, app ovo di android lagi error ya? tadi gak bisa login, sekarang malah gak bisa akses sama sekali. udah update di google play malah jadi gak bisa dipakai," tulis sebuah postingan di Twitter,"Ovo lagi gangguan apa gimana sih? Udah di update tetep ga bisa log in @ovo_id," begitu keluhan lain yang diutarakan user.Ketika dihubungi detikINET, pihak Ovo mengakui memang sedang ada isu di layanannya. Saat ini, mereka tengah berusaha memperbaikinya agar bisa pulih seperti sedia kala."Saat ini aplikasi Ovo sedang mengalami gangguan sebagai akibat dari gangguan jaringan yang mempengaruhi sebagian pengguna Ovo. Tim Ovo sedang berupaya untuk mengatasi kendala ini, kami mohon maaf sebesar-besarnya atas ketidaknyamanan yang dialami pengguna dan merchant Ovo," kata Sinta Setyaningsih, Head of PR Ovo.Simak Video "Rudiantara Semringah Sambut OVO Jadi Unicorn Kelima Indonesia"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/fay)
text:
Ovo's response to the Crash Application
05 Nov 2019, 16:22 by Tim - detikInet


Ovo Application. Photo: Rachmatunnisa / detikINET

Jakarta - Some Ovo payment service users report problems and spill complaints on Twitter. Ovo also gave their response. Since this afternoon, some users experienced problems where they could not make payments with Ovo. Some even signed out and could not log in. "@ Ovo_id Sis, the ovo app on Android is getting an error again? I couldn't log in, now it can't access at all. I've updated it on Google Play, so it can't be used," wrote a message. posting on Twitter, "What kind of interference are Ovo doing anyway? It's been updated but can't log in @ovo_id," was another complaint expressed by the user. When contacted detikINET, Ovo admitted that there was indeed an issue in his service. Currently, they are trying to fix it so that it can recover as before. "Currently the Ovo application is experiencing a breakdown as a result of network disruption affecting some Ovo users. The Ovo Team is working to overcome this obstacle, we apologize profusely for the inconvenience. experienced by users and merchants Ovo, "said Sinta Setyaningsih, Head of PR Ovo.Simak Video" Rudiantara Semringah Welcomes OVO Becomes the Fifth Unicorn of Indonesia "[Gambas: Video 20seconds] (fyk / fay)
